attributes.additional_details:
We us I voted for MPs because you sell us the package however, your all the same when you get into power you do nothing what you stated you would do for us,the public that voted you in!
Then you barter and haggle between yourselfs to get a better deal. If we vote for this I want that!
It stinks to high heaven that you take the pubic for complete idiots.
No more get the job done what we put you in power to do!
No more playing politics you lot! Get the ball moving. Get the jobs done. And for the sake of this country get it together instead of playing games like children.
U.K (GB). Is depending on YOU!
